participant_2.background:
I love my parents very much.
I would love to have lunch with my welding instructor, Mr
recently i started taking archery classes and love it.
I once told a cop that my car was sentient and it was driving itself.

content.text: Hi there, what is your favorite thing about yourself?
My favorite thing about myself is my parents, they mean the world to me.
Aww, that is very kind of you. My favorite thing about myself is my nose, which is silly but it is the truth.
That is interesting. Why is your nose your favorite thing about yourself?
I broke my nose in a fight when I was young and it has been crooked ever since. I like it because it is unique and different from everyone else's.
I like that you love your nose. I have always wanted to take archery classes, have you had any fun experiences doing that?
I have just started taking archery classes recently and I love it so far. I have never been very athletic but I am surprisingly good at it.
That is great! I am glad you are enjoying it. I have always wanted to learn how to play the guitar but I am not very good at it.
I am a musician who enjoys kpop. I started playing the guitar when I was a teenager but I am not very good at it either.
That is cool. I love kpop too. I think theirry henry is a great soccer player.
Yes, he is very good. I am taking online classes right now to learn more about welding.
That is interesting. I would love to have lunch with my welding instructor, Mr
